text: He was announcing his executive's rejection of the ultimatum to the ETU. In reply to the call for his resignation he said: "Our rules say that if an official resigns he is not allowed to run again for three years. "I have only 2 1/2 years to go before I retire, so this is an invitation from my good friends of the TUC that I should commit hara-kiri. He was announcing his executive's rejection of the ultimatum to the ETU.
